dashboard.description: Metrics pushed directly to VictoriaMetrics via API commands.

targets.expr: avg by (host_system, intf_internalip, intf_externalip, intf_name, intf_vpn, isp,server_id,server_location ,server_ip ,server_name,server_country) (speedtest_download_bandwidth_bps)

links.title: S.M.A.R.T. Attribute: 193 - Load Cycle Count; Load/Unload Cycle Count
S.M.A.R.T. Attribute: 197 - Current Pending Sector Count

targets.expr: max(smartmon_device_info{host_system=~"$host_system"}) by(disk, type, host_system, device_model, model_family, serial_number,rpm,capacity_bytes)

(max(smartmon_total_lbas_written_raw_value{host_system=~"$host_system"}) by (disk, type, host_system)) * (max(smartmon_device_sector_size_logical{host_system=~"$host_system"}) by (disk, type, host_system) )

(max(smartmon_total_lbas_read_raw_value{host_system=~"$host_system"}) by (disk, type, host_system)) * (max(smartmon_device_sector_size_logical{host_system=~"$host_system"}) by (disk, type, host_system) )

dashboard.title: VictoriaMetrics API Imports
